name: Peanut Butter Chicken
author: BLUESP
summary: Chicken breast cubes are simmered with onions and mushrooms in a rich peanut butter sauce. This recipe is delicious served over your choice of rice, noodles or quinoa.
ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch cubes
1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with juice
directions: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add the chicken pieces, and cook until chicken starts to turn white
Add the onion, mushrooms, and red pepper flakes
Cook, stirring constantly until onions are translucent, about 5 minutes
Pour the tomatoes and chicken stock into the skillet, and simmer for about 10 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through
Stir in peanut butter, and cook stirring constantly until the sauce thickens
This should only take a minute or two
If the sauce is not thickening, you may stir in more peanut butter
